thread.title: Blue Star Payment Solutions and ParkHub.com Team Up to Handle Mobile Point-of-Sale Payments for Parking Attendants
thread.title_full: Blue Star Payment Solutions and ParkHub.com Team Up to Handle Mobile Point-of-Sale Payments for Parking Attendants

author: admin
title: Blue Star Payment Solutions and ParkHub.com Team Up to Handle Mobile Point-of-Sale Payments for Parking Attendants
text:
Blue Star Payment Solutions 
DALLAS, Sept. 24, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- ParkHub.com, a leading technology company serving the global parking industry, today announced the selection of Blue Star Payment Solutions as a preferred processing partner within its PRIME mobile point-of-sale (POS) platform. PRIME, which stands for Parking Revenue Inventory Management Enterprise, is purpose built for the unique needs of parking lot attendants and operators. 
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150923/269812LOGO 
Blue Star Payment Solutions, providers of advanced payment processing technology, delivers the backend functionalities that work with PRIME's software and hardware to enable parking lot attendants to process credit cards, record cash payments and validate QR/bar codes from pre-purchased parking reservations. This alliance between PRIME powered by ParkHub and Blue Star Payment Solutions will allow event centers, such as stadiums, amphitheaters, amusement parks, and convention centers, to have more efficient parking processes and transaction controls. 
"We are excited to partner with an innovative company such as ParkHub," said Jerry Mooty, President of Blue Star Payment Solutions. "Taking full advantage of technology and integrating these systems into a streamlined process will improve customer experience, as well as efficiencies and revenues for parking providers." 
Blue Star Payment Solutions offers some of the most advanced payment processing technology in the marketplace that caters to Integrated Software Vendors, which enables the processing of credit card transactions in a secure manner. This deployment along with PRIME's real-time LTE, which is not dependent on WIFI or other potentially limited connectivity devices, allows operators to monitor parking inventory and transactions on their smartphone, tablet or any desktop. 
"Due to the complications of dealing with cash transactions, the PRIME platform was built for parking venue owners and operators to maximize revenue and real-time inventory," said Jarrod Fresquez, CMO of ParkHub. "We are proud of this new partnership with Blue Star to help optimize the processing of payments and integrate seamlessly with our systems." 
ABOUT BLUE STAR PAYMENT SOLUTIONS 
Blue Star Payment Solutions' mission is to supply its partners a best-in-class merchant services solution for their business through innovation and excellence through its partner, Bank of America Merchant Services. Blue Star combines a relationship with one of the world's most admired franchises, the Dallas Cowboys, and the number one-rated electronic payments company in the industry, Bank of America Merchant Services. With this solid team structure, Blue Star Payment Solutions can leverage the power of the Dallas Cowboys and Bank of America Merchant Services to provide clients the most competitive rates, fees, and service possible. Through this partnership, BSPS offers never-before-seen benefit packages that will transform the industry. For more information on Blue Star Payment Solutions please visit www.bluestarpays.com 
ABOUT PARKHUB.COM 
ParkHub.com is a Dallas, Texas-based technology company serving the global parking industry. The company's two services, ParkHub.com and Parking Revenue Inventory Management Enterprise (PRIME), are dramatically improving the customer experience while increasing revenue for the parking provider. ParkHub.com is an online parking reservation platform that is easy to use and simplifies the parking process for both the parker and parking owners and operators. PRIME is a mobile POS system that processes and records payments, and reports vital information to parking operators in real-time. ParkHub is a certified partner of Ticketmaster. To learn more about PRIME powered by ParkHub, email info@parkhub.com or visit http://prime.parkhub.com .
